Title: One Truth, One Tenderness
Description: Each shares one truth they haven’t voiced lately, and one thing they appreciate.

Title: Quiet Touch
Description: Sit close, place your hand gently on your partner's arm or back or heart, just breathing together for 1 minute.
Steps:
[
"1. Settle together. Find a cozy spot where you can sit close without distractions — maybe on the couch, floor, or even during a walk.",
"2. Recall a moment. Each take a quiet pause to remember one joyful or funny moment from your early days together — something simple that still makes you smile.",
"3. Share the story. One at a time, tell that story. Let yourself feel what it was like back then as you speak.",
"4. Listen fully. When it’s your turn to listen, simply stay present — notice their eyes, their tone, the warmth in the memory.",
"5. Pause together. After both have shared, take a slow breath together. Feel the small spark of connection between past and present."
]

Title: Comfort Blanket Moment
Description: Lie or sit together under one blanket, no talking, just shared warmth.

Title: What Touch Feels Safe
Description: Share what kinds of touch feel most comforting vs. overwhelming.

Title: Palm Rest
Description: Rest your palms together, noticing texture, feeling the warmth of shared presence.

Title: Breath Check
Description: Ask each other, “How’s your breath right now?” Then take three slower ones together.

Title: Safe Words
Description: Choose two comfort words for the week (“anchor,” “soft”); say them when either feels tense.
